bibl.title: Civic Integration of Jews in the Cities of the Greek East in the First Centuries B.C. and A.D.
bibl.note: Diss. Univ. of California, Berkeley. Summary in DA 65 (2004-2005) p. 647-A. - Considers in part. the Jews of Alexandria.
